remarks: The number of elements in a class abstraction with a restricted existential quantification.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Jul-2018.)
statement:
hashrabrex.1 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. Fin ) $.
hashrabrex.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. Y ) -> { x e. X | ps } e. Fin ) $.
hashrabrex.3 $e |- ( ph -> Disj_ y e. Y { x e. X | ps } ) $.
hashrabrex $p |- ( ph -> ( # ` { x e. X | E. y e. Y ps } ) = sum_ y e. Y ( # ` { x e. X | ps } ) ) $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph y $.
